Data Structures

Here are the data structures with brief descriptions:
_NE_input_Holds information of keys and stylus input for internal use
NE_AnimDataHolds information of an animation
NE_APIObjHolds information of an API object
NE_BMP_HEADERHeader struct for a BMP file
NE_CameraHolds information of the camera. The matrix is only updated when it is needed
NE_INFO_BMP_HEADERInformation struct of a BMP file
NE_MaterialInformation of one material
NE_ModelHolds information of a model
NE_PhysicsHolds information of a physics object
NE_SpriteHolds information for a 2D sprite
NE_TextPaletteHolds information for a palette
